Package nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.Domain

Class Domain

java.lang.Object
nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.Domain.Domain
public class Domain extends Object
Domain class - runs game logic.
Author:
Judah Dabora

  • Field Details

    • board

      public Cell[][] board
      This class is used to make a domain obj (game state). it will hold the 2d array for the board. includes getters and setters to edit game state

      called from persistency when load is called from app

  • Constructor Details

    • Domain

      public Domain(String levelInfo, ArrayList<String> inventory, Cell[][] cells, int playerX, int playerY, int treasuresNeeded, int gameTimer, List<Enemy> enemies)
      Domain constructor Defines a level of the game.
      Parameters:
      levelInfo - which level, level1 or level 2
      inventory - player's inventory (should start empty)
      cells - The 2d array of cells
      playerX - Player's starting X (col)
      playerY - Player's starting Y (row)
      treasuresNeeded - how many treasures to finish the level
      gameTimer - An integer, the number of seconds before losing the level
      enemies - The list of enemy objects

      getGameTimer
      Returns:
      int game timer

    • decrementTimer

      public void decrementTimer()
      decrementTimer Reduce the game's timer integer by 1

    • setCell

      public void setCell(int x, int y, Cell newCell)
      setCell Sets the board at [y][x] to be the cell newCell
      Parameters:
      x - the coord of the cell
      y - the coord of the cell
      newCell - The cell to set at that position

      getNumOfTreasures

    • hasAllT

      public Boolean hasAllT()
      hasAllT boolean flag for checking that all treasures have been obtained
      Returns:
      true if got all treasures

    • movePlayer

      public void movePlayer(Direction direction)
      movePlayer shifts the player's position on the board and checks for collisions with other game objects
      Parameters:
      direction - the direction to move the player

    • moveEnemies

      public void moveEnemies()
      moveEnemies updates every enemy in this level's enemyList, changing their directions when they encounter walls, updating their position and killing the player on collision

    • isQuestionTriggered

      public boolean isQuestionTriggered()
      isQuestionTriggered
      Returns:
      true if the question block has been triggered by the player

    • closeQuestionBlock

      public void closeQuestionBlock()
      closeQuestionBlock sets questionTriggered to false, signifying that the player is not reading a question block

    • isPlayerDied

      public boolean isPlayerDied()
      isPlayerDied
      Returns:
      true if player is dead

    • complete

      public boolean complete()
      complete()
      Returns:
      true if level is completed

    • resetBooleans

      public void resetBooleans()
      resetBooleans() resets playerDied, triggeredQuestion and levelCompleted for when restarting a level if you died or loaded it midway

      getEnemies
